title.narrative: Support project for freedom of expression journalism and public service broadcasting in Somalia

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to improve the professionalism of Somali journalists and support the transformation of government media towards public service broadcasting as defined in the new Somali Media Law. More balanced more diverse and bette r researched programmes increase citizens? access to information and promote the peaceful and democratic development of Somali society.During the first phase of the project a new multi-camera TV studio was constructed at Somali National Television (SNTV) i n Mogadishu. More than 250 journalists have also been trained in basic journalism skills and more ethical reporting in Mogadishu Puntland and Somaliland.Outside the new TV studio more training and technical support is required to improve the technical and journalistic quality of news inserts. Skills improvement and better understanding of journalism ethics is also needed among journalists in other parts of Somalia and Somaliland.Key activities of the project include:1. Construction of a multi-camera TV stud io at Somaliland National Television (SLNTV)2. Technical support and training to improve the news production at SNTV from news planning to broadcast3. Training on public service broadcasting and improved journalistic content production at SNTV including ch ildren and youth programmes4. Training on Media Law for government officials and security officers5. Training for journalists in Somalia and Somaliland on basic journalism skills and journalism ethics and promotion of media reporting for peace and social c hange6. Special training for women journalists7. Promotion of trade union rights among media workersUp to 400 journalists from all parts of Somalia and Somaliland are expected to take part in the training courses during four years.The main partners are Som ali National Television and Somaliland National Television. Other organizations involved with the project activities are the National Union of Somali Journalists (NUSOJ) Somaliland Journalists Association (SOLJA) Media Association of Puntland (MAP) and sev eral women journalist associations and regional journalist groups.
